it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.RemoveTile.RemoveTileState

  • Field Details

    • shipBoard

      protected ShipBoard shipBoard
      Represents the ship board associated with the current state. This variable holds the main structure or layout of the spaceship tiles and is manipulated by the state methods to update its configuration. It is expected to be initialized when constructing the state and used throughout the operations of various state transitions and modifications.

    • subShips

      protected ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subShips
      Represents a collection of subsets of spaceship tiles, where each subset is a group of connected tiles that forms a part of a ship on the game board. This variable is used to manage and manipulate the individual segments of ships that result from splitting or removing tiles on the shipboard during the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • RemoveTileState

      public RemoveTileState(ShipBoard shipBoard)
      Initializes a new instance of the RemoveTileState class with the given ship board.
      Parameters:
      shipBoard - The ship board associated with this state.

  • Method Details

    • GetNextState

      public abstract RemoveTileState GetNextState()
      Determines the next state in the tile removal state machine.
      Returns:
      The next state object of type RemoveTileState.

    • StateMain

      public abstract void StateMain(ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subShips, ShipBoard shipBoard, int playerID, int indextopreserve, int waste) throws Exception
      This method represents the main logic for a specific state in the game. It processes sub-ships and ship board configurations, and manages state for a particular player.
      Parameters:
      subShips - An ArrayList of ArrayLists containing SpaceShipTile objects, representing the sub-ships involved in the current state.
      shipBoard - The game board where the ship-related operations take place.
      playerID - The ID of the player whose turn or action is being processed.
      indextopreserve - An integer indicating the index of the sub-ship or component that needs to be preserved during this state operation.
      waste - An integer representing the waste or loss associated with the operation in this state.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during state processing.

    • StateMain

      public abstract void StateMain(ShipBoard shipBoard, int row, int col, boolean fromMistake) throws Exception
      Executes the main logic for modifying the state of the ShipBoard at a specific location.
      Parameters:
      shipBoard - the ShipBoard instance on which the state logic will be applied
      row - the row index of the tile to be processed
      col - the column index of the tile to be processed
      fromMistake - a boolean indicating whether the action originates from a mistake
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during execution of the state logic

    • chooseOneSubShip

      public abstract void chooseOneSubShip(int index, int playerID) throws Exception
      Allows a player to choose one specific sub-ship from the sub-ships list after a ship has been split. This operation is triggered when ship splitting occurs, and the player must decide which sub-ship to retain or handle.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the sub-ship to be chosen from the list of generated sub-ships.
      playerID - the unique identifier of the player making the choice.
      Throws:
      Exception - if the player ID is invalid, the index is out of bounds, or other issues arise during the operation.
